hesh1
#include "bits/stdc++.h"
#define int long long
using namespace std;
int read()
{
    int x;
    scanf("%I64d",&x);
    return x;
}
char a[100001] , b[100001];
int p[100001] = {1};
int h;
int H[1000001];
main()
{
   scanf("%s" , a + 1);
   scanf("%s" , b + 1);

   int n = strlen(a + 1);
   int m = strlen(b + 1);

   for(int i = 1; i<=n ;i ++)
   {
       p[i] = p[i - 1] * 29;
   }
   for(int i=1; i<=n; i ++)
   {
       H[i] = (a[i] -'a' + 1) * p[i] + H[i - 1];
   }

   for(int i = 1; i <= m; i ++)
   {
       h += (b[i] - 'a' + 1) * p[i];
   }
   for(int i = m; i <= n ;  i ++)
   {
       if(p[i - m] * (h) == H[i] - H[i - m])
         return cout << "Yes\n" << i - m + 1 , 0;
   }
   cout << "No";

}
hashpalindrome
#include"bits/stdc++.h"
#define int long long
using namespace std;
int read()
{
    int x;
    scanf("%I64d",&x);
    return x;
}
char a[100001];
int h1 , h2;
int p[100001] = {1};
main()
{
  scanf("%s" , a + 1);
  int n = strlen(a + 1);

  for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++)
  {
      p[i] = p[i - 1] * 29;
  }
  for(int i=1; i<=n; i ++)
  {
      h1 += (a[i] - 'a' + 1) * p[i];
      h2 += (a[n - i + 1] - 'a' + 1) * p[i];
  }
  cout << h1 <<" " << h2 ;
}
har xil qism satrlar
#include"bits/stdc++.h"
#define int long long
using namespace std;
int read()
{
    int x;
    scanf("%I64d",&x);
    return x;
}
char a[2001];
int p[2001] = {1};
int H[2001];
int w[200001] , k;
main()
{

  scanf("%s" , a + 1);
  int n = strlen(a + 1);

  for(int i=1; i<=n; i ++)
  {
     p[i] = p[i - 1] * 29;
  }

  for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++)
  {
      H[i] = (a[i] - 'a' + 1) * p[i] + H[i - 1];
  }

  for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++)
  {
      for(int j = i; j <= n; j ++)
      {
          int t = (H[j] - H[i - 1]) * p[n - i + 1];
          w[++ k] = t;
      }
  }

  sort(w + 1 , w + k + 1);
  int cnt = 1;

  for(int i = 1; i < k; i ++)
  {
      if(w[i] != w[i + 1])
        cnt ++;
  }
  cout << cnt;
}
